ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] A Little Help
ygData.msgSnippet: howdy, Its a lengendary character that hops server to server looking for his pet dragon.  I first saw him on Innoruuk server, then The Nameless, then The
ygData.messageBody:
howdy,

Its a lengendary character that hops server to server looking for his pet dragon. I first saw him on Innoruuk server, then The Nameless, then The Tribunal... Suppose to have a dragon invisible as a pet. This is rumor, few people have actually meet this character and seen his pet. There is a cartoon about him on one of the sites about him screaming for his pet.

Paul

From: Sylly Songsynger

Sent: Friday, May 05, 2000 1:14 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] A Little Help


?Que es este?

Care to elaborate? I never heard of this one.

Sylly
